title: Bob Odenkirk Returns!
itunes:title: Bob Odenkirk Returns!
itunes:subtitle: Bob Odenkirk [Better Call Saul, Breaking Bad, Nobody] is back to talk with Anna about how a home invasion inspired his new action film Nobody, doing his own stunts, feeling at home in LA, why Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul are so good (and when we get
description:
Bob Odenkirk [Better Call Saul, Breaking Bad, Nobody] is back to talk with Anna about how a home invasion inspired his new action film Nobody, doing his own stunts, feeling at home in LA, why Breaking Bad and Better Call Saul are so good (and when we get another season), how social media is like being a wedding guest, and more. Later in the episode, Anna welcomes back dating and relationship strategist, matchmaker, and founder of LEVEL connections, April Beyer as her official co-host of the Unqualified advice segment.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting  www.levelconnections.com

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:
